posts.post_content:
Nice Cobb!

There was a thread about these purple dye cards a number of years ago. This Cree I have does not look like it has paper-loss on the back, instead[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=79950&d=1354398518[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=79951&d=1354398540[/IMG] it looks as if the back was not printed in full. Cheers.
Yes mine DOES NOT have any paperloss either, nor is that paperloss on the front?? Its just like not printed on the back?? Printer scrap??

..from what I remember from the thread there were people that said printer's scrap and people that said it was someone's collection that had been subjected to a chemical spill. No one really knew what to make of the cards, although many had one or had seen one. I have seen lots of these purple dye t213-2, but had not seen a Cobb.
I searched for the thread and could not find it...if u locate please send to me. The unique thing to me is the backs, that there is no paperloss just not much printing...
